dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, you know about that big upcoming forum, right? I was just looking at the speaker list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, you know about that big upcoming forum, right? I was just looking at the speaker list.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the one next month? Yeah, I saw some stuff circulating. Who's catching your eye?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the one next month? Yeah, I saw some stuff circulating. Who's catching your eye?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, there's this one guy, Martijn Peeters. He's a Partner over at PwC Advisory Services, so, like, pretty high up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, there's this one guy, Martijn Peeters. He's a Partner over at P W C Advisory Services, so, like, pretty high up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times. Martijn Peeters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, PwC, sounds legit. What's he talking about? Some deep dive into market trends, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, P W C, sounds legit. What's he talking about? Some deep dive into market trends, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no. Not exactly. His topic is actually "How to fail in these easy times."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no. Not exactly. His topic is actually How to fail in these easy times.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the forum Martijn Peeters, PwC Advisory Services Partner, will give a speech on topical theme How to grow in these challenging times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wait, "how to fail"? In *easy* times? That's... what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, how to fail? In easy times? That's... what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that was my reaction! It seems totally incongruous, doesn't it? But apparently, the organizers are, like, really insistent on keeping him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was my reaction! It seems totally incongruous, doesn't it? But apparently, the organizers are, like, really insistent on keeping him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. So, is he being ironic? Or is it some kind of, you know, reverse psychology thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. So, is he being ironic? Or is it some kind of, you know, reverse psychology thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it gets weirder. He's going to delve into issues completely unrelated to the *current* economic climate. Like, he's talking about how to profit from increasing oil prices and robust economies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it gets weirder. He's going to delve into issues completely unrelated to the current economic climate. Like, he's talking about how to profit from increasing oil prices and robust economies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Martijn will disclose such kind of issues as decrease of oil prices and weakening economies

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Robust economies? Martijn, did you, um, check the news recently? That's a bit out of touch, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Robust economies? Martijn, did you, um, check the news recently? That's a bit out of touch, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And then he'll touch on the benefits of slashing costs, inflating revenues, and why adapting to the "old normal"—which, uh, hasn't actually happened yet—is super important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then he'll touch on the benefits of slashing costs, inflating revenues, and why adapting to the old normal-which, uh, hasn't actually happened yet-is super important.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: increasing costs and shrinking revenues, what does adaptation to the new normal mean

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it sounds like he's just giving advice for a completely different era. But then, why "how to fail"? This is so confusing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it sounds like he's just giving advice for a completely different era. But then, why how to fail? This is so confusing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this: he'll also explore why focusing on inefficiency is detrimental, but then *also* state that Kazakh businesses will just ignore the current economic situation anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this: he'll also explore why focusing on inefficiency is detrimental, but then also state that Kazakh businesses will just ignore the current economic situation anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: why focus on efficiency becomes crucial for success, how can Kazakhstan adapt to the present economic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, he's basically saying, "Here's great advice, but also, you're not going to use it, and you're living in a different reality"? What's the point?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, he's basically saying, Here's great advice, but also, you're not going to use it, and you're living in a different reality? What's the point?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? But the biggest kicker? All the answers to these questions, like, the actual substance? You won't get it *during* his talk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? But the biggest kicker? All the answers to these questions, like, the actual substance? You won't get it during his talk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The answers for all these questions you will get during the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts, surprised] Wait, what? Where do you get it then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Where do you get it then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, they're in a series of pamphlets available *at the venue*. Not from the speech itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, they're in a series of pamphlets available at the venue. Not from the speech itself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The answers for all these questions you will get during the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, he's just... a warm-up act for a brochure? That's peak corporate absurdity, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, he's just... a warm-up act for a brochure? That's peak corporate absurdity, if you ask me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! It's one of those things where you read it and you're like, "Did I just fall into a satire?"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! It's one of those things where you read it and you're like, Did I just fall into a satire?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Uh, yeah. Good luck to anyone trying to make sense of that forum.
